title: The Rhyme-Time Book of Christian Virtues
description: Picture for ages 4 to 7. Now you get all 12 of the Building Christian Characters books in one volume. Stories on sharing, fairness, lying, thankfulness, helpfulness, and other traits teach children Christian values in a fun, memorable way. The humorous rhyming text and large, bright illustrations will delight child and adult alike. It's the perfect set for every home.
author: michael-p-waite
